I thought I'd share a story inspired partly by history mostly by our
Minuro Lair rpg.

Title: Forever

Rating : General sudience age 14+

Characters: Itou Kashitaro, Sagara Souzou (a/k/a/ Mitsu)

Warning: implied m/m relationship

The story can be found here:

http://www.livejournal.com/users/ito_kashitaro/12558.html#cutid1

Barb Sheridan
